title: Taberarechaina yo!
sinopse:
Makoto is a very shy girl who fell in love with Ryuu... but she can't talk to boys! Yuuki-kun, Ryuu's friend and the most handsome boy in the class approaches Makoto with a very special petition!

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Love Maniac
Volume 2: Sekai wa Kare wo Chuushin ni
